Description:
Build Your Dream Today!
An opportunity not to be missed. Situated in the Olivine Estate, measuring 400 m2 (approx.), titled and ready to build that dream home you have always wanted. This generous block provides all the space needed for you to bring to reality the design of your dreams.
Close to Hume Anglican Grammar School, Just a few minutes' drive down Donnybrook Road will take you to the new commercial centres of Merrifield and Cloverton. A short 15 minutes' drive to the vibrant township of Craigieburn as well as Epping and Wallan for even more education, medical, transportation and entertainment services. Upcoming 22 hectares of open space to enjoy and explore lush parks, waterways, trails, wide range of sporting facilities including two ovals with cricket nets, and netball courts. Direct access to Melbourne's CBD in just 45 minutes from nearby Donnybrook station.
Proposed new Cloverton Station is planned for the future serving both the Cloverton and Olivine communities
Call us today!
Preet Brar 0416 085 144
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435
*Photo ID Required At All Inspections*
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Checklist:
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Ideal Location & Priced To Sell
This 584m2 (approx) titled land with generous dimensions of 16m x 36.5m is perfectly located in sought after Merrifield Estate which is one of the fastest growing master planned communities in Victoria.
This large size allotment will offer you innumerable options to build your dream home.
Merrifield is set to become a flourishing city within Melbourne's booming Northern corridor.
• Just 30kms north of Melbourne CBD and 20 minutes from Melbourne Airport.
• Easy access to Hume Freeway
• Close to all amenities like schools, parks, public transport and shopping centre.
Seize the opportunity as this won't last long and be a part of the thriving community.
Call Sharad Kapoor at 0416 404 595 for more information.

Description:
Luxury, Location, Lifestyle - A Complete Family Home
Spacious in design with all modern-day finishes, this 4 bedroom home commands your attention.
Comprising of 4 fitted bedrooms (2 Master with WIR & Ensuite). The third and fourth bedroom with walk in robe and three fully serviced bathrooms.
Spacious open-plan family/dining area complemented by a Cesar stone-bench kitchen complete stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher, an abundance of bench space, impressive walk in pantry and roomy laundry with plenty of storage. Alfresco entertaining with 2nd kitchen, rear landscaped yard to entertain family and friends while the kids play to their heart's content in the safety of their own private space.
High ceilings and doors throughout, ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, alarm system,, remote-control double garage with internal access and so much more. Ideally located close to Highland Shopping Centre complex, public transport, popular primary & secondary schools.
This is quite simply THE ONE that you have been looking for. Please feel free to contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542
Photo ID required for an Inspection.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
STUNNING EX-DISPLAY IN BLUE-CHIP LOCATION
A lifestyle of complete luxury, comfort and convenience is assured to the lucky buyer of this stunning Henley ex-display home. Boasting a simple yet practical floor plan, this well-designed home boasts a smooth integration between the stunning kitchen domain through to family meals area and enclosed decked alfresco entertaining area to give the home a free-flowing feel and provide the very best in family entertaining.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 massive bedrooms, huge walk-in robe & deluxe ensuite to a large master bedroom, spacious dual living zones with separate formal lounge, super-sized meals & family area perfect for large scale family gatherings, fully equipped kitchen with great storage, 900mm stainless steel appliances & ample Ceasar stone bench space.
Step outside and be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco deck which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration. It also provides a safe low maintenance haven for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
Loaded with high end features, including ducted heating/refrigerative cooling, plantation shutters, stunning spotted gum hardwood floors, motorized security shutters throughout, and so much more!

Description:
Feature-Packed Entry into This Popular Trillium Neighborhood
A brilliant first home or astute investment opportunity, this freestanding residence is a winning choice either way with its free-flowing design, premium upgrades throughout and established gardens all-round.
Nothing to do but simply move in and enjoy, the home's impressive interior comprises 3 bedrooms (large master with WIR) together with a private ensuite, stylish central bathroom and separate WC.
Bathed in natural light, the open-plan living/dining area is further enhanced by a sleek stone-bench kitchen with breakfast bar, soft-close cabinetry, tiled splashbacks, stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher.
Other stand-out features of this terrific home include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, video intercom, on-trend black tape ware and fittings, as well as a full-size laundry and ample linen storage.
Completing the picture is a sunny backyard with lush lawn area, along with an internally-accessed garage (remote-control) and additional driveway parking space.
Walking distance to Central Park, it's also close to Club Trillium with its exclusive residents' facilities, as well as easy access to primary and secondary schools, shopping centres and Hume Freeway via the Grand Boulevard extension.

Description:
Finally, A place to call home!
Nestled within a very highly sought pocket of Roxburgh Park is this beautifully appointed home perfect for any family. Boasting virtually no maintenance landscaped gardens to match its natural parkland surrounds, the home itself provides that inviting feel, that we all desire. Well-appointed throughout this very thoughtful design, the floor plan provides a host of living and lifestyle options. The central kitchen is the ideal hub for entertaining as it overlooks an informal zone showcasing a family and meals area plus a massive alfresco area that features a Jacuzzi making it perfect for year round entertainment.
The kids haven't been left out either as their wing includes three great size bedrooms and the central bathroom. The main bedroom at the front of the home includes a large walk in robe and an en-suite.
A host of additional features include; ducted heating, cooling, one and a half car lock up garage with drive though access, and much more. All of this perfectly positioned within walking distance to all key amenities including both primary and secondary schools, Roxburgh Park village shopping centre that offers an abundance of retail stores, cafe's and restaurants and not to mention the Roxburgh Park train station. An inspection will not disappoint!
Auction Terms
Deposit: 10%
Settlement: 60 Days

Description:
Great Home, Great Location, Great Value
We all know that the Mandalay Estate in Beveridge is resort style living at its best, and we all know that the facilities there are hard to compete with elsewhere. I am sure you are all aware of the award winning golf course, restaurant, gymnasium which you have full access to and the brand new Primary School which is the latest addition to the overall plan for Mandalay. But what you may not know is what the future holds for Mandalay: situated in one of the biggest growth corridors in Victoria, the next ten years will see the area change dramatically for the better and you now have the opportunity to secure a home in the best selling market in years!
What's not to like about a large home on a 571 m2 allotment within a short walk to facilities and virtually opposite a playground? With features like high ceilings, plenty of storage space, large bedrooms and three living areas, you have a fantastic opportunity to secure a home for the future

Description:
Double Ensuite Delight in Mt Aitken!
Welcome to this well presented double storey 33.5 sq (approx.) modern home in the heart of the highly sought after Mt. Aitken Estate.
Wide entrance that leads you into the big lounge and study nook along with massive family area with lots of natural light flowing on to separate meals and well-appointed designer kitchen finished with waterfall stone benchtops and 900mm cooktop. Fully equipped ensuite downstairs along with a separate powder room is an extra feature that will leave you impressed. Walk upstairs to the convenience of other 4 bedrooms including one full ensuite and others with built in wardrobes. There is a big rumpus / Leisure area upstairs which opens up to a beautiful huge balcony with panoramic views of Craigieburn and city to enjoy.
Quality inclusions of this property includes high ceilings on both the levels along with refrigerated cooling and downlights throughout the house along with 40 mm stone benchtops in all the bathrooms. Rain shower heads with wall to wall tiles in all the bathrooms are some of the luxury inclusions with a separate kitchen in the garage for big family's catering needs. Fully landscaped front and backyard along with a separate shed will compliment this already feature packed dwelling of exceptional quality.
Easy access to Mt. Aitken Road, Craigieburn Central Shopping precinct, Splash Aqua Park, Pelican Childcare and quality public and private schools in the area along with public transport at your doorstep, this property is centrally located for ease and convenience.
Built with high inclusions and eye for perfection this home will be a prized possession for one lucky buyer. Inspection is must for luxury home buyers with taste for perfection!!
Additional Inclusions:
-5 Bedrooms (2 En suites)
-High Ceilings
-Study
-2 Kitchens
-Security cameras
-Alarm system
-Refrigerated Cooling
-Ducted heating
-Stone benchtops
-Tool shed

Description:
The Definition Of A Family Home!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 14 Emerald Circuit Craigieburn. Situated on a 550m2 block and located in a family friendly neighbourhood, this is the ideal place to call home.
This family delight offers five bedrooms with one master showcasing a walk in robe and ensuite, two bedrooms with walk in robes and a further two bedrooms with built in robes, all serviced by a main central bathroom with bath.
Step further inside and be overwhelmed with the gleaming kitchen with caeserstone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and plenty of bench and storage space which overlooks the spacious meals and family area. This spacious home also offers a separate formal lounge and a rumpus room in the back ideal for the kids own retreat.
With a spacious double and a half garage plus the added bonus of a drive through garage to the backyard there is plenty of space for additional cars, jet skis, trailers etc.
This home is packed with full of additional extras including zoned ducted heating and evaporative cooling, alarm, intercom, shed, day and night blinds and much more.
Positioned a large block with plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy and located in a lovely location what more can you want? Secure this opportunity before it is gone.

Description:
SIMPLY IRRESISTIBLE!
An Outstanding opportunity to secure this stunning Porter Davis quality build luxury residence, incorporating the ultimate in modern elegance and the finest quality finishes. Boasting an intelligently designed floorplan with a dazzling array of premium fittings and fixtures that will impress the most discerning buyers. High on impact and built to the highest standard, this home takes low maintenance living to dizzying new heights. Impressive entrance highlighting by hardwood floors, study and a spacious theatre room, expanding into an extensive open plan living/dining area featuring a state of the art kitchen with exquisite stone bench tops and splashbacks, double oven, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry. Accommodation abounds with 5 generous bedrooms, including master suite with spa bath, a further 4 bedrooms - 3 with deluxe ensuites plus an additional downstairs bedroom with two way bathroom for extra comfort. Extra luxuries include high ceilings, CCTV security system and separate zoned heating & refrigerated cooling systems. Positioned perfectly for all families with easy access to park & playground, public transport, proposed shopping centre and proposed facilities including schools, recreation and community facilities. Only minutes from Donnybrook Train Station and easy access to Hume Highway and proposed future outer metropolitan ring road.

Perfectly positioned in one of Craigieburn's favourite neighbourhoods, this brick home has been meticulously maintained and offers a wonderful opportunity for those looking to modernise. Description:
Instant Appeal!!!
Harcourts Roxburgh Park presents 12 Puckle Avenue, Mickleham. Showcasing exceptional contemporary living this brand new residence is situated in a great location and offers excellent opportunities. With stylish fixtures and finishes throughout, this contemporary residence is the perfect place to live, entertain and bring the family together. With a long list of features this home has something for everyone.
* Four bedrooms and two bathrooms. Main bedroom is complete with large walk-in-robe and dual vanity en suite with over-sized shower. Remaining bedrooms with built in robes are serviced with the central bathroom and separate WC
* Open plan living area incorporates stunning modern kitchen with black 900mm cooking appliances, dishwasher, large island bench with breakfast bar, 40mm stone bench-tops, walk in pantry, adjoining dining and living room.
* Features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double car garage with internal access, contemporary neutral interiors, quality fixtures and fittings including window furnishings, AC4 floorboards, alarm system, intercom, down-lights, stone bench-tops, landscaped low maintenance gardens front and rear, 2700 high ceilings, and so much more!
This beautiful brand new home will attract plenty of attention so early inspection is recommended.
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Flat, Corner Allotment measuring 608m2 in Beautiful Trillium!
This fantastic opportunity of securing a rectangular & corner 608sqm allotment measuring 17m x 36m - a total land size of 608m2 has come up for a lucky family to build their dream home and to enjoy the peaceful surroundings, tranquil views and the cosmopolitan lifestyle planned in what's considered one of Melbourne's finest estates for years to come.
This prominent flat allotment is situated amongst Trillium's finest homes & future parkland just across the street. Trillium Estate, a beautiful master planned community in picturesque Mickleham, where family and friends can experience luxury, amenity and a true sense of community. At the heart of the Trillium community is the exclusive $4 million residents-only recreation facility, Club Trillium. With exceptional facilities including a heated four-lane 25-metre swimming pool, children's pool, gym, community garden and tennis court, the club is more than just a building, it's a place to connect with family and friends, old and new.
Just a few minutes to the south sits Greenvale, another established community providing a host of retail, education and other facilities - all just a few minutes' drive away.
Land: Approx. 608m2
Settlement: 30, 60 or 90 days
Asking $399,000
Contact: Phillip Mercieca - 0402 419 827
phillip.mercieca@raywhite.com
facebook.com/phillip.mercieca.raywhite
